messages.message: Unexpected any. Specify a different type.

suggestions.desc: Use `unknown` instead, this will force you to explicitly, and safely assert the type is correct.
Use `never` instead, this is useful when instantiating generic type parameters that you don't need to know the type of.

messages.message: `'` can be escaped with `'`, `‘`, `'`, `’`.

fix.text:
Your new API key has been created. Please copy it now, as you won't be able to see
                  it again.

suggestions.desc: Replace with `'`.

messages.message: `'` can be escaped with `'`, `‘`, `'`, `’`.

fix.text:
Stops Stripe from automatically sending funds to your bank. Guardian may
                            turn this off automatically when fraud is suspected. You can resume
                            payouts once you've reviewed the transactions.

suggestions.desc: Replace with `'`.

messages.message: React Hook useEffect has a missing dependency: 'selectedAccountId'. Either include it or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [selectedAccountId, supabase]
